div.p: WLINGZ.

YOU'RE DELIGHTFUL.

YOUNG LADY.

I'M GOOD.

HOW WILL YOU DOING?
NOW WHEN YOU SAY NERD, WHAT WOULD YOU CONSIDER NERDLY PURSUITS, DO YOU HAVE NERDLY PURSUITS?
ARE YOU --

I'M SOCIAL SIGHTED TO BE HERE.

I'M STAYING RIGHT HERE.

BRING A SLEEPING BAG.

AND THEN A LOT OF iPHONE PASSING.
AND THEN YOU KNOW PLAYING AGAINST MY COMPUTER.

>> MY COMPUTER IS A BASTARD.
IT'S BEEN KICKING MY ASS LATELY SO I HAD TO PUT IT ON MEDIUM.

BEST WORD.
>> UH-HUH.
>> Jon: YOU CAN DO BEST WORD LIKE FOUR TIMES.
>> UH-HUH.
>> Jon: IF YOU CAN SAVE IT UP TO THE END, YOU WILL CRUSH YOUR COMPUTER.
YOUR COMPUTER HAS NO CHANCE.
>> I ALWAYS USE IT EARLY.

PIE SON SAID, HE'S 7.
HE SAID WITHHOLD GRATIFICATION.

LIKE ANYBODY WHO IS A KID THAT SMART T WOULD BE YOU.

(LAUGHTER) WITHHOLD GRATIFICATION, YOU MUST.
THIS FILM, YOU AGE, AM I CORRECT.

35, MAN.

IT TAKES PLACE IN THE U.K.
AND WE GO TO FRANCE IN THE MOVIE TWICE.

I'M ALWAYS AIMING FOR TRIPLE WORD AND I FIND THAT IT DISTRACTS ME FROM WHAT COULD
BE VERY FINE WORDS AND PLAYS BECAUSE I'M LOOKING FOR THE BIG SCORE.

THAT IS NOT A WORD.

I AM.

IT ONE DAY TURNS INTO THIS,
